forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds under mostly sunny skies, as the gentle warmth of the sun bathes the bustling city. Although the high is projected to reach 67, a soft breeze from the west-southwest whispers through the streets, reminding us to embrace the cool touch of the afternoon, where temperatures will dip to around 65. The clarity of the day reveals the iconic structures standing proud against the skyline, while hints of a marine layer linger off the coast, casting a subtle veil northward towards the Golden Gate. 

As daylight wanes into a partly cloudy evening, temperatures will settle around a mild 56, perfect for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a quiet evening at your favorite café. Dressing in layers will offer comfort as the sun transitions, allowing for relief as cooler gusts of wind weave through the avenues. Today invites simple pleasures—perhaps a visit to a local bookstore or a mid-afternoon escape in one of the city's lush parks—activities as rich and fulfilling as the culture that surrounds you.
